sentences.sContent: However, a study has found that when we smell or hear something during an emotional experience, the odour or sound is woven together with the memory in the same region of the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, a study has found that when we smell or hear something during an emotional experience, the odour or sound is woven together with the memory in the same region of the brain.
sentences.sCn: 不管怎样, 一个研究发现当我们在情绪波动时闻到或者听到什么, 那么这些气味和声音便会和当时的记忆编织在一起并存储在大脑的同一个地方.

synos.tran: 编织；交织（weave的过去分词）；编造

phrases.pCn: 编织袋；布袋；聚丙烯编织带
方格布；无捻粗纱布；粗格布

trans.tranCn: 编织；交织（weave的过去分词）；编造
